      • equals

        public abstract boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        In order for shapes to be equal, they must be of the same class and have the same dimensions. They do not need to be associated with the same lattice geometry or have the same boundary conditions in order to be considered equal.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
